description.narrative: At least one public awareness campaign conducted every year

comment.narrative: None Level of awareness to be established during first year of implementation
3 public awareness campaigns conducted in the demonstration provincesmunicipality

Every LPMO organized public awareness campaign at province level For example the TCL from Tianjin was jointly Baidu recycling launched by UNDP MEP involving film star MsZhao Wei as advocate with both local and international news coverage in August 2014 Hubei PMO made a short video broadcast in Wuhan city subway from 4th to 6th June 2015 Jiangsu PMO combined Jiangsu Tencent launching an O2O way in ewaste recycle in May 2015 All of the activities provided public awareness on ewaste as well as to where the ewaste was sent
3 public awareness campaigns conducted in the demonstration provincesmunicipality

description.narrative: Authorized recyclers registered with the EPR Treatment Fund

comment.narrative: Only about 120 formal recyclers registered
All newly established formal recyclers in the demonstration provincesmunicipality are registered

15 new WEEE processors were registered At the end of the 2013 91 WEEE processors were established already By the end of the 2014 106 WEEE processors were registered totally by the MEP which were considered as national activities in this project At the next step we will revise the WEEE processor register regulation because of 9 new types of ewaste involved

description.narrative: The project will address the POPsPTS release sensitive ewaste stream in the recycling dismantling treatment and final disposal processes of Waste Electrical and Electronic Equipment WEEE
Efficient and functional EPR and WEEE management system

comment.narrative: EPR Treatment Fund established but not efficiently functional
National policy about EPR finalised

This is the third year of EPR Treatment Fund implementation at the national level REMARKThe EPR treatment fund is implemented by government involved many ministries on July 2012 A more standard guideline on ewaste dismantling was updated The policy on 9 new kinds of ewaste dismantling standard has been in progress of being updated which will enable the EPR Treatment Fund to be implemented more smoothly
National policy about EPR finalised

This is the third year of EPR Treatment Fund implementation at the national level REMARKThe EPR treatment fund is implemented by government involved many ministries on July 2012 A more standard guideline on ewaste dismantling was updated The policy on 9 new kinds of ewaste dismantling standard has been in progress of being updated which will enable the EPR Treatment Fund to be implemented more smoothly

description.narrative: Amount of WEEE treated by permitted recyclers in the three demonstration locations

comment.narrative: Over 2 million units of WEEE collected and processed by permitted recyclers at the 3 demonstration
Estimated 50 increased of WEEE collected and processed

Over 2 million units of WEEE were recollected and processed under the strict monitoring by local EPBs in our three demonstration provinces Tianjin Jiangsu and Hubei Because of the huge statistics the current data only reflects the dismantling WEEE from 1 July 2014 to 31 march 2015 The latest data will be calculated in next annual project report
Estimated 50 increased of WEEE collected and processed

Over 2 million units of WEEE were recollected and processed under the strict monitoring by local EPBs in our three demonstration provinces Tianjin Jiangsu and Hubei Because of the huge statistics the current data only reflects the dismantling WEEE from 1 July 2014 to 31 march 2015 The latest data will be calculated in next annual project report
